bill.title: Insurance
bill.description: Prohibits insurers, producers, & their representatives from offering & providing insurance as certain purchase inducement or from using certain words in advertisement; authorizes insurers & producers to offer & give certain noncash gifts, items, & services & conduct raffles & drawings; provides requirements for offers & provisions of value-added products & services by insurers & producers; authorizes time-limited pilots or testing programs for certain products & services; revises prohibited practices by life insurers & long-term care insurers relating to use of genetic information; provides prohibited practices by disability income insurers relating to use of genetic information; authorizes such insurers to use genetic information for specified purposes under specified circumstance.
